- Location: Ceiling-mounted rectangular metal louver vent (white) in interior space.
- Materials: Metal grille with louvers; painted white; surrounding textured drywall/plaster.
- Condition: Minor edge cracking and paint/drywall compound peeling at the right edge; screws securing grille appear intact.
- Air path: Louvers unobstructed; no visible debris.
- Recommendation: Patch/repaint around vent and repair edge veneer as needed; monitor for moisture if in a damp area.
